data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations read with Schedule III of the SEBI Listing Regulations we wish to inform you that following the approval of the Board of Directors of The Indian Hotels Company Limited ("Company" or "IHCL") a duly constituted Committee today approved the execution of certain definitive agreements by the Company together with its (step-down subsidiaries) namely ANK Hotels Private Limited ("ANK") and Pride Hospitality Private Limited ("Pride") to collectively acquire 51% stake in Brij Hospitality Private Limited.

data.caption: Termination Of Agreement
data.news_body: Pursuant to the execution of the Termination Agreement (a) the Restated and Amended Shareholders Agreement dated November 4 2011 entered into amongst inter alia certain shareholders of the Target Company and (b) Name and Trademark License Agreement dated November 22 2007 entered into between the Target Company and the Company stand terminated and all rights and obligations under the said agreements stand cancelled and annulled.

data.caption: Rumour verification - Regulation 30(11)
data.news_body: This is with reference to news article appearing in media outlets and in todays edition of Times of India with the headline "Taj may exit NYCs Pierre in $2bn deal. With respect to the above-mentioned article we would like to clarify that The Indian Hotels Company Limited (IHCL) does not own The Pierre New York. It has leasehold rights for the hotels and operations continue as usual. Recent media reports stating otherwise are misleading and speculative.

data.news_body:
Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated} for the financial year
ended March 31, 2022 along with the Auditor''s Report thereon. In this regard please find enclosed:
Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the financialyear ended March 31, 2022.
Auditor''s Report in respect of the aforesaid Financial Results
Recommended a dividend of~ 0.40/- per Equity Share of~ 1/- each fully paid up of the Company @ 40% (previous year~ 0.40/- per Equity Share of~ 1/- each fully paid up @ 40%}, subject to the approval of the Members at the Annual General Meeting.
Accordingly:
i. the dividend payable on one Equity Share of ~ 1/- each fully paid up will amount to Rs 0.40/- (Forty paise Only}
ii. the dividend payable on 100 Equity Shares of ~ 1/- each fully paid up will amount to Rs 40/- Rs. Forty Only.
